---
title: "ICDO3 source vocabulary"
output: 
    github_document:
        df_print: tibble
editor_options: 
  chunk_output_type: inline
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
source("../../lib/read_tables.r")

path_vocabulary_tables <- "../../lib/OMOP_VOCABULARY/"

```

## Import Vocabulary
ICDO3 is already in OMOP. Can be extract from the vocabularies. 

```{r load, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
atc_source <- read_table_concept(path_vocabulary_tables) %>% filter(vocabulary_id == "ICDO3")
```

## Create CONCEPT table 
```{r}
write_csv(atc_source, "CONCEPT_ICDO3.csv")
```
